crediting_program_name.description: The name of the carbon crediting program issuing the project's credits

standard_name.description: The name of the standard associated with the project's credits.

initial_standard_version.description: The version of the standard under which the project was initially registered.

current_standard_version.description: The version of the standard under which the project is currently registered.

methodology.description: The methodology that the project is following.

initial_methodology_version.description: The version of the methodology initially used for the first credit issuance.

current_methodology_version.description: The version of the methodology currently being used.

current_methodology_document.description: The link to the documentation for the current methodology being used.

project_id_type.description: The type of project id (e.g., registry id, universally unique identifier id)

project_description.description: Description of the mitigation activities undertaken by the project, preferably the registryâ€™s public description.

project_design_document_link.description: The link to the project's project design documentation (PDD).

exemptions.description: If relevant, any approved deviations from methodology requirements granted by the registry.

program_type.description: If referring to a program of activities, specify the type of program.

activity_type.description: If the project (activity) is part of a broader program of activities, specify which type of project the activity is.

mitigation_type.description: The type of offset the project is expected to generate.

project_sector.description: The sector in which the project is developed and the mitigation activities conducted.

project_type.description: The emission reduction or sequestration pathway of project.

current_registry_project_link.description: The link to the project on its current registry.

project_status.description: The current status of the project.

project_status_updated_at.description: The date of the current status of the project

number_of_crediting_periods.description: The total number of crediting periods assigned to the project over its lifetime as defined by the methodology or registry.

crediting_period_length.description: The duration (in years) of each crediting period granted to the project under the applicable methodology or registry.

project_registration_date.description: The date the project was registered on the registry.

project_list_date.description: The date the project was first listed on a registry.

other_project_documentation_type.description: The type(s) of additional project documentation.

other_project_documentation_link.description: The link(s) to the project's additional project documentation.

project_developer_name.description: The name of the primary developer of the project.

project_developer_website.description: The website of the primary developer of the project.

project_developer_email.description: The email of the primary developer of the project.

project_developer_phone.description: The phone number of the primary developer of the project.

project_stakeholder_type.description: The role of the stakeholder in relation to the project (e.g., verifier, technical consultant, etc.).

project_stakeholder_name.description: The name of the selected stakeholder type.

project_stakeholder_website.description: The website of the selected stakeholder type.

project_stakeholder_email.description: The email address of the selected stakeholder type.

project_stakeholder_phone.description: The phone number of the selected stakeholder type.

origin_registry.description: The name of the project's original registry (if it has moved registries)

current_registry.description: The name of the project's current registry.

validation_body_name.description: The name of the validation body that validated the project (if applicable).

validation_date.description: The date on which the project was validated (if applicable).

validation_report.description: The link to the project's validation report (if applicable).
